Comment: How is this any sort of surprise?  Trump has repeatedly said that he wants tariffs. He wants tariffs because he wants to give super wealthy people a tax cut. And the word "tariff" is spelled differently than "tax" so he thinks he can get away with people believing that the increased prices that they see... are being paid by the other country?  It's absolutely insane. But the bottom line is that he wants tariffs in place. He's said it.  Repeatedly.  The "fly in the ointment" for him was that other countries reacted harshly. He just wanted to impose tariffs and have everyone accept it. Somehow import at the same level they had and consumers would just keep buying at the same rate. And that would generate all of this money that ... doesn't friggen exist.
Author: CockBrother
